reviews.review: This game is what hip millennials would call "poggers" Jokes aside this game is decent. its pretty toxic so be prepared for that otherwise you should be all good. its a thrill getting chased and can keep you on edge and its also fun being the killer and chasing.

I've literally purchased this game on three different platforms, that's how much I love it.  The character/skin designs get cooler and cooler, the maps are varied, and playing with different perks/against different killers keeps the game feeling fresh every time I pick it up.  Plus it's super easy to learn, and does not take much to become a successful player.

能不能别装死了啊！bug这么多就当看不见？最近遇到的最离谱的bug是疗养院玩军团的时候，开狂暴跳二楼窗户直接把我卡那了，怎么也动不了，然后那仨人类就搁那蹲起闪手电，我真的是布响丸辣！！！！

I started playing Dead by Daylight in 2020 at the start of the pandemic. The insane grind originally made it a great pandemic game, however, it is now approaching post-pandemic and BHVR has done nothing to ease the perk grind for newer players. I have over 1,000 hours in this game, which is an insane amount of hours to put in for any game and I still cannot play with the builds that I want on the characters that I want because the perk grind is just so awful.

DBD has also been plagued with cheaters and hackers in 2022. In 2020, it was rare that I would run into a hacker. A hacker would happen maybe once every few months. Now, I run into cheaters and hackers several times a day.

I want to love this game and I still do in a lot of ways. I absolutely do not recommend anyone waste their money on this game. From the perk grind to the insane amount of cheaters and hackers in this game, it makes it unplayable unless you're ready to invest 5,000 hours+ into this game. Even if you have the perks on the characters you want, this game has become unplayable due to the high number of cheaters. Do not buy. Spend your money elsewhere.

Es ist schwierig hier eine zu schreiben man sieht wieviele Stunden ich in dem Game schon habe. Man könnte es am besten mit einer Art Hass Liebe beschreiben das Game macht teils enormen Spass das große manko hier ist stellen weise heftige Bugs die das spiel geschehen beeinflussen können wie z.B. man kann den Spieler am Boden nicht aufheben usw. das andere sind die Crashes bzw. das man einen Disconnect bekommt entweder weil Steam down ist aller Mittwochs nachts oda es an der Firma direkt liegt. Und trozdem spielt man es immer und immer wieder weil es einfach keine vernünftigen alternativen gibt leider somit hängt man dort fest und wird sich stellenweise weiter aufregen und hoffen es wird besser Hoffnung stirbt zuletzt das andere sind Cheater keine ahnung wieso Leute sowas feiern Cheats sind vielleicht ok in einem Singelplayer Spiel aber in ein Multiplayer Game gehört sowas einfach nicht rein wie arm muss man den sein um dies zu tun habt ihr keine Ehre bei sowas schämt euch!!!! Aber genug davon werde wieder ein paar runden suchten in der Hoffnung es passiert mehr als bisher Peace Out :P <3 Review folgt in English noch ;)

I personally thing that Dead by Daylight is a really good horror puzzle game mainly because the chases and how fun it is when you have friends to play with!

Jogar isso eh extremamente parecido com jogar um jogo de cartas, como Magic ou Yu Gi Oh, com um deck cookie contra alguem que montou/comprou um baralho, ele sabe exatamente o que o baralho dele deve fazer, e consequentemente ele eh mais forte que o seu. Voce pode sim ler cada modificador e efeito e o caralho, o que eu acho um porre, ou voce pode simplesmente ir pegando os itens com os bloodpoints e etc, mas se voce nao parar e pensar em como buildar (talvez ate em combinacao com aqueles que estiverem jogando contigo), as chances de voce cair contra um monstro que voce desconhece e que vai simplesmente te esmirilhar sao altissimas.

Quer se divertir com esse jogo? Eu vejo duas possibilidades pra isso, a primeira eh arrumar 4 amigos pra fechar uma sala, um deles sendo o monstro. A outra maneira eh simplesmente virando Buda de tanta paciencia, por que puxando partida com o matchmaking do jogo significa ser pareado com um desgracado que comprou a expansao que atualmente esta quebrada.

No mais, nao comprem essa dlc-fuck-fest, pirateiem e usem hamachi ou qualquer coisa do tipo.
one of the best games out for years!!!

This game is complicated, Once you sorta understand it quickly becomes a love-hate relationship, You love playing but also it makes you question your life choices. The worst part is the survivor games where you get your fellow survivors but they have the intellect of a Plants Vs Zombies Peashooter or the survivors/killers that just radiate 100% pure Toxic, Enough toxicity to put the entire fallout game franchise to shame. (Also No Cross Progression so had to start from the very beginning so that was fun. Came over from Ps4)
